body:
Hey guys!
I really need help on how to do those fancy HTML profiles on my about!
Can someone help me?
Or maybe someone can make a vid on youtube showing how to do it!
I just really wanna make one, if anyone could help it'd be great.
~DiamondPorkchop3

title: I need help!

replies.body:
HTML isn't very hard once you start to get into it. It may be a tad bit overwhelming at first, but you'll get use to it later on if you stick to basic sutff :)

I used this website to get me going.
